column4: I'm interested in moving to a fully linux environment for Rails 3 coding, and was wondering which Ubuntu flavor i should go with? 10.04 or 10.10?
should i stick with LTS until the next LTS comes out for coding purposes?
thanks crimson figured as much just don't have much experience with debian/ubuntu. mostly CentOS
as a dev id prolly suggest 10.10, isnt LTS locked to only security updates? 10.10 will give you more up to date apps
